name: practicesoftwaretesting-playwright
description: Playwright automation testing suite for Practice Software Testing application

scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup
scripts.test:registration: npm run setup && npx playwright test registration.spec.ts
scripts.test:registration:headed: npm run setup && npx playwright test registration.spec.ts --headed
scripts.test:registration:debug: npm run setup && npx playwright test registration.spec.ts --debug
scripts.test:registration:specific: npm run setup && TEST_CASES=$TEST_CASES npx playwright test registration.spec.ts
scripts.test:admin-product: npm run setup && npx playwright test admin-add-product.spec.ts
scripts.test:admin-product:headed: npm run setup && npx playwright test admin-add-product.spec.ts --headed
scripts.test:admin-product:debug: npm run setup && npx playwright test admin-add-product.spec.ts --debug
scripts.test:admin-product:specific: npm run setup && PRODUCT_TEST_CASES=$PRODUCT_TEST_CASES npx playwright test admin-add-product.spec.ts
scripts.test:registration:clean: npm run db:reset && npm run test:registration
scripts.test:registration:clean:headed: npm run db:reset && npm run test:registration:headed
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose exec -T laravel-api php artisan migrate:fresh --seed
scripts.db:reset:no-seed: docker-compose exec -T laravel-api php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.db:status: docker-compose exec -T laravel-api php artisan migrate:status
scripts.db:gui: echo 'PHPMyAdmin available at: http://localhost:8000 (root/root)' && echo 'Direct DB connection: localhost:3306 (root/root)'
